website_summaries.verdict: This minimalist wallet maximizes the amount of card storage space through "smart" design. High-quality leather construction and generous cash compartment with a money clip.
pros: Pull-tab features improve access to most important cards
Slim profile, fits well in front pocket or suit jacket
RFID protection thwarts card chip readers
cons: Pull-out strip can become damaged over time
Card slots are tight, require long break-in period

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: Better than I expected. I carry several bills amounting to $100 to $150. Very easy to extract any bill by pulling lightly without disturning others. Much easier than an ordinary billfold. One of my hands is numb with age, and I normally have trouble removing bills from my wallet. Since it is my left hand that has the problem I carry it in the front left side pocket. I no longer have a problem removing my wallet. I found the leather to be high quality. ID is visible without removing the card, and the few other cards I carry are easily removed.
customer_reviews.author: Jack E Baker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wallet. Like it a lot, fits my money fits my cards I didn't put all of them in there just what I needed. Able to show my license when you need to and easy access to the money instead of having to flip through it. I purchased this one and I am going to purchase another one awesome wallet. Fits in the pocket in the front where I prefer. Or inside my blazer ,with no bulge .
customer_reviews.author: ELREY1355

customer_reviews.title: Good..RFID interferes with tracker cards.
customer_reviews.text: Leather seems good in that it's nice and soft. Definitely smaller that your normal wallet which is what I wanted. No room for pictures but has a place for your driver's license. Not that sold on the red tab to pull out your cards, but overall like the minimalist arrangement. I only carry about 4 cards plus cash so its good for me. Debit/DL,Costco, Insurance. I wanted to post to let people know...I tried one of my TILE's which lets you track your wallet if you lose it. The RFID or whatever in this wallet interferes with that and it will not work if the tracker is placed inside the wallet. I probably will attach with a ball chain.
customer_reviews.author: EagleRock Dude

customer_reviews.title: Don't like a bulky wallet? BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is by far my favorite wallet of all time. It's durable, minimalist, yet still holds all my stuff I've had this wallet for the past 5 months. I've used it everyday since then, I get people asking me where I get this wallet because it looks pretty fly. PROS - The pull card out feature is sick and crazy convenient - Holds all the cards I need it to without being too bulky! - Durable - Good Price - Gets complimented for originality CONS - Doesn't have a place to hold coins **The pictures are after 5 months of heavy use**
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Love this wallet
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet! Great for commuters (work in the city and less is more) leather is excellent, I've read that some people don't like the scuffs the leather gets which is quickly but it adds character lol and if need be I just condition it with leather conditioner and it treats it. Just overall a perfect wallet for me and not it holds more cards then in need so I use it for my buisness cards as well!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, holds everything I need and small. Best feature is the slide out card functionality.
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this wallet. The slide out functionality for my two credit cards and one debit card is amazing. Very slim, fits in my front pocket perfectly. So far it is probably the favorite wallet I have ever owned. Still have room to add a few cards if necessary and the money clip seems solid so far. On the fashionable side of things I already received compliments from my girlfriend, doesn't mean much I know ;) But a friend saw the slide out function and small size and asked where I got it. As long as it holds up for at least a year it'll have been well worth the purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Good overall, could be great with better leather
customer_reviews.text: Good wallet overall with many places to store cards. I have about 15 cards in the wallet plus the billfold filled, and the wallet is still relatively slim. It's the first wallet I've owned where I could comfortably sit with it in my back pocket. Reason for four stars (rather than five) is that the leather is of a lower quality, and it's already showing wear after a few months (especially the spine). However, I cannot complain really, given the price. I will consider this brand again when it comes time to buy another wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Very functional!
customer_reviews.text: Very functional and stylish! My only issue is that this particular finish tends to get dirty and "scratched" more easily than a black leather or dark brown leather version would. I love the quick access to my daily needed credit and debit cards. The pull-tab is a great feature. I've reduced my wallet load by more than 50%!! The license sleeve makes accessing and pulling your license out very easy compared to others I've owned. Overall excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: John Cortese

customer_reviews.title: Not leather but not bad
customer_reviews.text: I looked for days to find a wallet that was actual leather and looked like Andar wallets. This one had good reviews and looked exactly like the wallet I wanted. However, this wallet is not leather. A lot of these reviews are fake I assume. The actual product is not bad though. It's pretty durable and looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tito

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet, but you have to trust the RFID ...
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet, but you have to trust the RFID is actually inserted otherwise I'm not sure how to verify???? Really like this wallet only couple small things that don't knock down stars IMO is the drivers license has to be pulled out toward the center, when you have cash its a slight slight inconvenience just getting it over a few bills. The other thing is the clip is bigger than expected, but it doesn't make the wallet itself any thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: For many years I carried my wallet in my back pocket until it was stolen recently. Stolen because my big thick wallet was uncomfortable to sit on so I always kept it in my computer bag. I made the switch to a front pocket "Minimalist" carry. While the change from back pocket to front takes some getting use to for habit sakes, this wallet is great. Not too small and not to big a fat. I hardly know Im carrying in the front pocket and tend to forget its there. I love the slide pouch for your main credit card.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dale

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet. Nice and slim and works well as a front pocket wallet. I keep an ID in the see through compartment, a credit card in the quick access slot, 4 cards in the slot you pull the cord to access, a few business cards in one of the internal slots and as many as 15 bills in the money clip. With all of these things the wallet is still plenty slim. As goofy as the pull cord seemed at first, I am now a fan as it does make accessing these cards very simple.
customer_reviews.author: Delta0n3

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet!
customer_reviews.text: I came from a very slim Machine Era Co wallet that held a a maximum of 4 or 5 cards and a few folded bills. I needed a wallet to replace it since I have more cards and wanted to hold more cash. This is the perfect wallet for me. Although it's bigger than what I'm used to from the Machine Era Co wallet, I'll take this any day over the other wallet. I love the ribbon to pull out the cards, the ID slot, and how it stores cash. If you're looking for a new wallet, don't be hesitant to give this a try.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Vertrees

customer_reviews.title: Great Product @ Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product based on recent experience on another wallet from Serman. Both are great and under a 1 year warranty. Few weeks after purchasing the first product, I received an email from Serman on a discount that can be applied on the second wallet which was also discounted on amazon. So I got the benefit of two discounts and I have a wallet to back up my first purchase and a different color. I highly recommend. it is a quality nice detailed product.
customer_reviews.author: O. Itani

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: While I am mostly satisfied with this wallet I have two main problems. 1st the money clip should be tighter an hold less bills if necessary (less than 5 bills it holds onto loosely). 2nd, I have only had this wallet for two weeks and it looks like I've had it for years. While this means the leather broke in easily and quickly, I'm afraid that means it may fall apart quickly as well, this seems to be a logical progression. I will update after longer use.
customer_reviews.author: joshua alter

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Not as thick as my old wallet ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Not as thick as my old wallet and holds the same content. I especially like the pull tab where I keep all my medical stuff. The bill fold clip is so much better than digging for the right bills in the bill compartment and it easier to keep organized. My ATM card or money card is easily available in it's own slot. The drivers license has a see through window and is easily pulled out if needed.
customer_reviews.author: P. Stenzel

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a discrete wallet
customer_reviews.text: I can't find a bad thing about this. If you're looking for a minimalist wallet then this is a great buy, especially if you don't want the bulk or hardness of some other metal minimalist wallets. It is small, easily fits the number of cards I need to carry, and is not noticeable in my front pocket. Can't speak for how well it will wear, but so far after a few weeks it is working out great.
customer_reviews.author: RooiValk

customer_reviews.title: Way too small.
customer_reviews.text: If it was what it looked like on website it would have been awesome, but what arrived was way too tiny. Think the size of your license, but even that sticks out and doesn't completely fit. Ridiculous because there's absolutely no hidden compartments when there could have easily been with better design and I don't have a ton of cards like 2, ecards and license, yet this garbage design can't even fit that. If all you're looking to hold is a driver's license this will work for you.
customer_reviews.author: BluArtistEyes

customer_reviews.title: This wallet is really an expanded money clip - compact and functional
customer_reviews.text: I could do without the money clip and, instead, would prefer a real money slot. I think space would not be sacrificed with the slot. Overall, however, the wallet is compact and very nice-looking. The cards are a bit tight on the slots, thus difficult to pull out, but I believe that, with the passage of time, slack will build up enough to make access easier. Overall, the wallet is compact and functional as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Alves

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend. Looks professional and still slim enough for front pocket.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend. Looks professional and still slim for front pocket. A nice upgrade from a money clip. It's definitely not as slim as just a money clip but it's slim enough for the front pocket where I'm used to. Easy slide access to your main card is great. Getting money in and out of the little clip is a little more awkward than a clip or wallet since all the bills balance on that one wire, but once the bills have been in there for a day it's better.
customer_reviews.author: R. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: I did have to trim down the number of (useless) cards and paraphernalia I carried in my older wallet, but it had more than enough room and I did not have to compromise on anything I perceived as "critical", although I did end up loading the apps to replace the old health insurance cards. I think that is a good thing. Just the right size and fits in my front pocket. There are smaller, thinner wallets, but small steps... This one does nicely. Leather feels nice although it is showing signs of wear (i.e., character). As long as it just is appearance, I am good with it.
customer_reviews.author: jim borden

customer_reviews.title: Great color. Looks very clean!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wallet. It’s slim and fits my needs perfectly. The only thing that I thought could be improved was the strap length on the quick access pocket. Mine does not quite retract all the way. Still, I’m very happy with the purchase and I love that they offer a replacement money clip if anything happens. My last slim wallet had a broken one and I would have liked to have this option then.
customer_reviews.author: aman

customer_reviews.title: So far Very Good
customer_reviews.text: I've only had this wallet for about a week, but it has exceeded expectations. It's good look, fits in my front pocket invisibly, and with my most-used credit card in the space with the thumb tab, everything is working smoothly and efficiently. The front pocket wallet this is replacing lost half of its stitching after only a year of use. I don't know how long this one will last, but so far, very good.
customer_reviews.author: Ancient TV Showrunner

customer_reviews.title: Best wallet I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: The feel, size, and material is fantastic. It does not look or feel "cheap" at all - on the contrary, it almost feels custom made. I like the set up of this wallet. It is absolutely PERFECT. The money folds nicely with the clip, easy access. Your every day card is accessible on the outside. Two cards are available via (pulley system?) little string/piece of fabric allows you to easily retrieve cards in the middle slot. Then your ID is in a clear slot. I am a male, it fits perfectly in my pocket and just feels classy while housing all my essentials... and then some!
customer_reviews.author: CMM

customer_reviews.title: Really like the thought of the thumb slides to allow easy ...
customer_reviews.text: After my last travel trip, I wanted a smaller wallet to carry in my front pocket. This fit the need. Soft leather, high quality. I fit all the cards I carry from my trifold into this wallet. Really like the thought of the thumb slides to allow easy access to card I use the most. As well as the pull to release other cards I have stored in this space. Great product, glad I found you.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: So disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The clip inside the wallet (for holding cash) became loose within a week of use. My husband rarely carries much cash so it certainly was not because it was stretched!! Every disappointed in the SERMAN BRANDS RFID Blocking Slim Bifold Genuine Leather Minimalist Front Pocket Wallets for Men with Money Clip
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Review only for California Desert color due to dye odor
customer_reviews.text: Review only for "California Desert" color due to strong (and disgusting) turpentine/leather dye odor. I previously ordered a Slate Gray wallet and had no such issues and the wallet design was so phenomenal I decided to order an additional color. Unfortunately I made the mistake of ordering California Desert and the leather dye smell is unbearable. I let it air for a week with little improvement. It is unusable and so "wet or moist" with dye it would likely stain business cards or other items. I've contacted the seller today and will update. The is so disappointing mostly because the first wallet was exceptional. I must say the wallet design itself is exceptional and the card strap is ingenious.
customer_reviews.author: ReviewWhenItMatters

customer_reviews.title: Wow. This wallet is absolutely beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the box and unwrapped this wallet, I was shocked. This thing is beautiful. The style, the rich color, the soft leather, the perfect stitching... I would have paid twice the price if I had known how awesome this wallet would be. In my 50+ years, I’ve bought quite a few wallets, and all of them have cost about as much or even more than this one. But not one of the others was anywhere near as awesome as this one. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Brian in Alaska

customer_reviews.title: Really good
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of thin and minimalist wallets, and thought this one had the best design at a reasonable cost. Fifteen or more years ago, my ex bought me a Coach wallet that proved too fat for me; I pulled out the two-pocket photo and ID insert and have been carrying that as my wallet ever since. I hope this wallet lasts as long and gets that nice patina. I've got about 5 credit-sized cards, my ID, my insurance card, and a couple of cardboard "5th one free" punchcards, and this wallet adds very little thickness. This review started with four stars, but I realized there was really nothing about it I could take a star off for.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Crenshaw

customer_reviews.title: Great product, horrible shipping experience!!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 star review is entirely due to shipping, or lack there of. My order was canceled once, and delayed twice after I repurchased the wallet after the unexpected cancellation. Finally, I did receive my order and so far it has lived up to my expectations and possibly beyond. Quality seems to be high and it stores a mostly all of my cards. Not all of them, but admittedly had way too many and needed to downgrade from George Constanza status. It stores an amazing amount for it size though and sometimes I have to pat my pocket to make sure it’s still there.
customer_reviews.author: Reed

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I feel proud in taking my wallet out of my pocket to pay for something. I love the center clip to hold my cash and it is able to fold completely while sitting on the counter with money in it. the option to quickly retrieve the most used card comes in handy. I had other wallets before but this is here to stay .I had another brand with the magnet side to hold your cash but it was not too practical, the cash kept getting in the way to reach my cards. I knew I had a great product simply by assessing the package that it came in .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Slim Wallet Around!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd Serman Brand wallet I have owned and they are great! I tried a cheaper version in between and that was a msitake. The material is of the highest quality and worht the money and then some. Great overall design and I love the easy access to everything. The only thing you should watch for is not to overstuff the pull tab with 5 cards and then later down the road go down to 2 or 3 cards because it will make it loose and cards could fall out. I found out the hardway...lol Love this wallet and it will last you a long time! Great look also!
customer_reviews.author: david manning

customer_reviews.title: I love this wallet!
customer_reviews.text: For years I carried a large wallet/checkbook combo, switching over to a small tri-fold wallet when I travel. I was looking for a replacement for the wallet that I travel with when I found this wallet. For its size, it holds a lot! So much in fact that after returning from my first trip with this wallet I decided now t to switch back. Seriously... Who still takes checks these days anyways... 😜 So far it has held up well and I am impressed with the materials. I would highly recommend this wallet to anyone that is looking to downsize.
customer_reviews.author: Nate K

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS WALLET!! (California Desert)
customer_reviews.text: This has been an amazing wallet! Everything is just so convenient and useful. * * Only downside is that I wish the money clip actually could be tighter. Even when turning the screw to tighten it still doesn’t clasp on as tight as I would like it. But overall, this is awesome and you won’t regret this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Couples D-light 4 You

customer_reviews.title: Works well as a back pocket wallet
customer_reviews.text: Used this in my back pocket for a week now and it wear a nicely. Love the simplicity of it reducing the bulk I carried around in previous wallets. I keep 3 credit cards on the pull tab, one card in each of the two inner slots, and 2 hard ID cards along with a paper ID in the clear slot and usually about 5 paper bills in the clip along with 4 business card on the outside and this combination makes for ease of access along with a comfortable wallet to sit on.
customer_reviews.author: Kornhouse

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and versatility.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality.....much better than expected. Wallet is much thinner than expected with credit cards, drivers license, etc in it. I really like the money clip embedded in wallet instead of classic open space in wallets to put dollars bills, etc. I paid over 70 dollars for an advertised thin wallet from Belroy...but my beagle puppy destroyed it....didn’t want to pay 70 dollars again...I like this wallet much better and it smells like newly tanned leather......for under 20 dollars, great deal......even the packaging was done very professional when opening the wallet box.
customer_reviews.author: GE

customer_reviews.title: good wallet,
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product, the features included are just right. The money clip makes me feel like I could be ritch, and the separate compartments for credit cards are really handy. The material is soft and comfortable. So please give this product a try, I tell you you won't be disappointed. I believe that if you want something that is quality you have to have a company that truly cares about what they make. I will exsplore other products offered by the manufacturer. In conclusion, in my opinion you can't go wrong with this slim men's wallet, good job Leo. Leigh Winfield
customer_reviews.author: leigh winfield

customer_reviews.title: Quality Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Quality wallet. I love how slim it is and the card retrieval tab is awesome. Many people that have seen me use it have remarked how useful that would be. The only issue i see is that any time I show my Drivers License it looks like I'm offering a bribe. lol
customer_reviews.author: Tom Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: All the right features
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son. He doesn't like large wallets but he liked this one. It holds ID, and maybe 3 cards. It has a money clip in the middle which he liked, but it did make a small bump in the fold because of the clip which he was not sure about. Soft leather, fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: AJ Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent wallet
customer_reviews.text: Wallet itself is great quality. Love the thin design and the slide out card section is more genius than I realized. You will LOVE that feature. Only 2 reasons I can't give five stars. One, the wallet got slightly damp and the leather seems ruined. Two, the money clip lost its "snap" and won't work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but not truly "minimalist"
customer_reviews.text: Not as minimalist as the description might suggest. Got this as a replacement for my Bellroy that WAS truly minimalist in size (apparently a discontinued model now) and realistically held only 6 cards, and no cash unless it was tri-folded into one of the pockets. I hardly never carry cash, but removing the metal piece does not significantly reduce the thickness so I have left it in just in case. Wish the pull-out was on the inside as I can see it possibly getting torn/damaged on its current location. Good value for it's cost, but would've gone with my old Bellroy were it still available.
customer_reviews.author: gtoman67

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, quality wallet without the bulk. The leather is of good quality and should be long lasting. Gives you feeling of a wallet and not just a business card holder like other slim wallets. I agree with other reviewers in that you are flashing your cash when showing your ID, so I just put my ID in another card slot. Currently I have 6 cards in the pull-tab pocket, CPR card in the window pocket, a card in each of the 2 inside and quick use outer pockets. All that puts it at 2 cm or .625" thick. This is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: jpwilson

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't keep it.
customer_reviews.text: The design is great. The material on the California desert is a suede type of leather which I didn't like and the color didn't match the pic to me. Could be to others, I'm not saying I'm completely right but I ended up returning it for the dark caramel in a similar style but same brand. The pockets and money clip worked great. The ID holder didn't really take the whole ID. Like 2-3mm didn't go in the slot.
customer_reviews.author: mr. p sosa

customer_reviews.title: Love everthing about this
customer_reviews.text: Quality, real leather unlike wallets that claim "Genuine Leather", but really Faux bonder leather. The design is simple, efficient and low profile. I was amazed how much stuff I had in my old one when transfer. Since this is simple, there is not many places to stuff junk away, forcing me to stay lean. Loving this new lifestyle and the quality is top notch. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Wallet and Solid Construction
customer_reviews.text: I like the slim design and solid construction, but I was concerned that my credit cards could slip out of the exposed pockets after pockets became stretched. I maybe over cautious, but I placed rubber band around wallet to secure. For peace of mind, I replaced wallet with front pocket formed wallet from Rogue Industries.
customer_reviews.author: marz

customer_reviews.title: Best wallet ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am loving my new wallet. It was even better in person than the picture. I wish I had taken photos of the unwrapping because that too was a surprise. Gorgeous box, stylish bag protecting. If I didn’t know the price I’d thought someone had bought me a $500 wallet. I know what I’m buying my dad and brothers for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: CKing5453

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best wallet I have ever owned. In fact I bought a second one to keep on reserve for whenever this one wears out. The quality is very good and the design is terrific. I carry a dozen cards and they are all easy to access. I especially like the slot on the outside of the wallet for one card. I use it for a debit card that I use several times a day and it is so easy to access that card.
customer_reviews.author: P Flanagan

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality that Achieves the Purpose
customer_reviews.text: Just received this wallet. Appears to be of very good quality and well worth the price. Much more compact and slim compared to my previous wallet. I always carry my wallet in a front pants pocket and this new wallet should serve the purpose very well.
customer_reviews.author: Flash G

customer_reviews.title: Great small wallet
customer_reviews.text: I was able to transfer all of the contents of my bulky wallet into this sleek wallet. The compartment with the pull strap can hold about 5-7 cards but does become a little stretched out, which can be problematic if you take some cards out.
customer_reviews.author: Shel Rawson

customer_reviews.title: Buy this wallet!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Superb Wallet. Great manufacturer insight into the design and utility. So slim. Fits beautifully in your front pants pocket. Formerly a huge fan and owner of the TRI-HOLD wallet. This product far surpasses that brand on so many levels. Moreover, it is half the price. Is it too late for a refund? Give it no thought!!!! Buy this wallet. Without question, it is my favorite of all time.
customer_reviews.author: Shimon

customer_reviews.title: Excellent downgrade
customer_reviews.text: I used to use a tri-fold, but it got too bulky because of unnecessary cards like rewards or cards I didn't use but once a year. The wallet is minimal. I can put the everyday items in it and I also know that my cards are protected with the RFID blocking.
customer_reviews.author: M. J. Skopczynski

customer_reviews.title: Overall I love the wallet
customer_reviews.text: Overall I love the wallet. Had just the right amount of card holders. The pull tab card slot is pretty cool. That’s my favorite part of it. The outside compartment is kinda tight and If I push my card all the way down it’ll get stuck, but that’ll loosen up with wear. It fits great on my back or front pocket. Only negative is I bought the California desert color and what I received is really light colored compared to the pictures. So just keep that in mind if you decide on that color. But overall a great wallet
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Slim wallet and billfold into one
customer_reviews.text: Never thought that a slim wallet and a billfold can come together. But here it is! A little bigger than I thought but I was able to fit in 12 bills, 10 cards, and 3 business cards into this. It's a little thick, but definitely slimmer than a generic wallet. It's a beautiful wallet as well. But the best thing about this wallet is it's ingenious pull out red tab where you can pull out your most used cards. Very very convenient and I absolutely love the pull out tab. If anything, buy this wallet for the pull out tab and you'll see how useful it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the tab function and clean design
customer_reviews.text: This is one intuitive wallet. I love the tab function and clean design. I have been through a few wallets lately looking for the perfect slim design. This fits the bill. What separates this from the others is the quality of the leather and the wallet itself. Do yourself a favor and shell put a few extra bucks for a better slim wallet.
customer_reviews.author: GLW

customer_reviews.title: Small Wallet Just Right
customer_reviews.text: I have used the wallet for two weeks and it works great. If you have receipts you have to save you will have to slide it under the clamp. I have several credit cards and licenses in the wallet. It has easy slides for access to your cards.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Improved utility
customer_reviews.text: I have too much stuff to put in the wallet. That is on me. The features are very nice and the internal bill fold is much better than my old one with a magnetic exterior clip that was subject to release. I am extremely satisfied and i am sure the leather will stretch some.
customer_reviews.author: Segovia

customer_reviews.title: The wallet is able to hold all eight of the cards I typically carry.
customer_reviews.text: The wallet is well constructed and looks understatedly elegant. Including my license, I carry a total of eight cards. Most of the other wallets I've tried in the past just weren't able to accommodate that many cards. If they could, the cards were so tightly packed that it was nearly impossible to remove them. Not so with the SERMAN wallet. It holds all my cards comfortably and all of them are easily removed from the wallet when needed. The wallet also comes with a money clip on the inside, which is easily removed for those that don't need it. I'm very happy with this purchase and would recommend the SERMAN wallet to others.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful wallet
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful wallet. I am a woman and I got it to use for myself. It’s the perfect size for a pocket, and it looks much pricier. I’d get another one, but I’m poor and really can’t justify spending on a wallet that I don’t NEED. However, I love this and definitely recommend. It’s beautiful for a man or a woman!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, well made wallet, offers a lot of Convenient Card storage options as well as a money clip for holding your cash, and the quick pull tether is a very nice touch for accessing the cards that aren’t placed in the exterior pouches. If the wallets holds up durability wise it is one of the better wallets I’ve ever owned. Only time will tell about that.
customer_reviews.author: Sean D.

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet.  Superb quality.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this wallet for a few weeks now and love it. I've had a couple other wallets of the same style, however this wallet has been the best one I've had by far. Great quality, worth the price. I was skeptical about the "pull flap card ejecter" thing at first, but I think its actually one of the better features that i haven't had on any other wallet before.
customer_reviews.author: Jayahyee

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely in my front pocket, the #1 feature of this product for me is the pull tab for your credit card. I am coming out of a Slim Wallet into this and so far its been a nice replacement. I get it 4 of 5 because im not sure long term ownership and materiel quality yet. Nice fist impressions how about that :-)
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: If you’re about to switch wallets, you know how much hesitation sets in. I finally switched to this and it’s been great. The leather stretches not long after you put your things in but, it works great.
customer_reviews.author: J. C

customer_reviews.title: Love this wallet
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet. I thought I would have a hard time adjusting to the clip instead of a slot to put bills in, but it was an easy transition. It's just the right size for me and holds everything I need it to. Been using this for 3 months now and it is my overall favorite wallet I have every had. I would definitely get another one when this wears out. It seems to be holding up well, so it may be a while.
customer_reviews.author: Argusi

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! But the cash clip is not very strong.
customer_reviews.text: Love the wallet but the cash clip is not very strong. That red ribbon thingie is really cool and especially useful. It reminds you that you left your card if the red ribbon is dangling (you will see). Even considering the weak clip (which is easily removable), I love it. Taking one star for the clip. Sorry,
customer_reviews.author: jenea

customer_reviews.title: Works great but the metal thinghy tho......(Updated)
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet approximately 6 months ago. Worked great until the metal bill holder thingy (technical term) broke and the spring fell out. I don't carry cash that often and so I don't use it that much. I would have liked for it to have lasted longer. Back to the drawing board I guess, ***Update*** I was contacted by the manufacturer and they have made things right! They offered to replace the wallet but I told them I only needed a money clip and the express shipped me 2 of them. I couldn't be happier. All is well again!
customer_reviews.author: Bob Your Uncle

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet. Excellent quality leather
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet. Excellent quality leather, some minor wear on the surface after a week of use, but that's normal for genuine leather. Some very minor wear on the pull out tab, but again this is expected after extensive everyday use. Most importantly, it's able to hold 6 cards in addition to my driver's license and plenty of cash, all in an extremely slim profile. Definitely recommend it for anyone looking for a slim wallet that can still hold plenty of cards and cash.
customer_reviews.author: Sherif

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love the overall construction of this wallet. It holds a tone of cards and is minimalist in design. My favorite feature is the pull tab so I can access all my cards wothout having to pinch each one with my fingertips. The only con is it was washed accidentally and the spring in the metal clip came out. It still hold my cash just isnt very secure now. Overall a great wallet for the price!
customer_reviews.author: stephen kutch

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Expected
customer_reviews.text: When looking for a slim wallet you can get caught up in all the seemingly “great deals” after hearing some horror stories about the products received not being the quality promised, I was skeptical to order one online. However, I am very pleased with My Sherman Brand wallet! It is a high quality product and the hidden, strap release pocket can easily hold my 6 cards that I don’t use often. The packaging it arrived in was a great touch and shows that if they spend that much time/effort into delivering the product, then they must expend the same effort in manufactung the product.
customer_reviews.author: A. Springsteel

customer_reviews.title: My favorite wallet!
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this wallet. Definitely a cut above the rest in quality, packaging and overall design. Would make a great gift because of the excellent “unboxing” experience! Been using it for about a year as my primary wallet...no complaints. One word of caution...if you plan on carrying more than 5 or 6 cards including ID, get a bigger wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Sly

customer_reviews.title: Practical and Useful
customer_reviews.text: I use it everyday and usually abuse my wallets. Great quality and I'm very happy with the practicality. It can hold 2 cards in each card slip if you need to. Once you break it in, it actual gets better with age. I'll buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Graves

customer_reviews.title: Good wallet for my use
customer_reviews.text: This wallet works good for me as I don’t carry a lot of cash and have limited cards. It appears well built and closes nice and tight. I like the money clip on the inside as my old one was on outside and would wear holes in pants.
customer_reviews.author: Just out of the cave

customer_reviews.title: Best money clip/ wallet
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of less is more and never been a fan of old school fat wallets that stick out your pocket. This money clip wallet is no nice! I love the different finishes I went with California Desert. The clip is great and how the cards are organized is amazing, simple function with a lot of style. A must for anyone looking for a legit moneyclip/ wallet.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: So Far Great
customer_reviews.text: Been carrying this wallet in my front pocket for a few days now. It was a little stiff getting the cards in to start with, but seems to be stretching out very nice. Great looking and just the right size.
customer_reviews.author: TappsFam

customer_reviews.title: This is a very high quality wallet!  Get one!
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is amazing! The quality of the leather is top notch! I did not expect to be so excited about this wallet! The money clip is great. It holds multiple bills and there is tons of room for all my cards. I absolutely love this wallet! I got mine in the light brown but would love to get black now that I know I’ll get such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality and great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my husband. I was impressed with the quality for the price. It’s perfect for his needs as he only carries about 5 cards, ID and cash. The profile is slim and sleek and it looks like a higher end piece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet. If I had more money to carry around, I would buy another one! Low profile, yet holds everything. Multiple credit size cards, identification cards and MONEY. Please note, cash and credit cards are NOT included with purchase. I wasn't expecting either with my purchase and I wasn't disappointe. But this wallet is really awesome. Going to get at least one more for a gift for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fruci

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wallet. very slim. money clip is perfect. card access is very convenient. Looks good. I put a small Mynt RFID chip in it to track it if I lose it. Any chips larger than the one I used will not fit well in this thin wallet. This used one of the card pouches on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Wrath

customer_reviews.title: A Fantastic slim wallet
customer_reviews.text: The wallet overall is FANTASTIC! The card slot with the pull tab is great(can hold three cards here), that's my favorite part. The leather and quality of the product is awesome. The only reason it did not get 5 stars was that the money clip mechanism failed at just over a year. If the wallet was open the loose money would fall out. I purchased my first one in October 2017, and recently replaced it with the exact same product. It's very worth it.
customer_reviews.author: CallmeDrT

customer_reviews.title: Well thought out
customer_reviews.text: I really like it! Had the George Kostanza wallet going for far to long. Most of the slim options ive seen are farvto limiting interms of whatbthe can hold and/or they are quite hard and rip clothes. This thing is great! Soft feel of the leather and great storage... and the money clip is low profile and no hard edges so wont rip clothes with that either. Great design. The light leather gets a little scratched but thats to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really does block all RFID no matter where the card is
customer_reviews.text: I used to keep my RFID work access card in my wallet and just put my wallet against the door sensors to get in. I tried the access card in all the possible places I could put cards and the door sensors couldn't read the card. So sure, I can no longer keep my access card in my wallet, but at least my RFID credit cards are safe!
customer_reviews.author: Scott C

customer_reviews.title: Great small wallet
customer_reviews.text: This is a great small wallet. The slots for the credit cards are a little bit tight, just use those slots for the lesser used credit cards. The slot with the pull out tab is great. Put the cards used the most in that compartment. The money clip seems fine and you are able to adjust the tension in accord with the number of bills you have. This wallet came packaged so well, was very impressed. This is a class A company that takes pride in the product they produce.
customer_reviews.author: lk

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable price, excellent leather wallet
customer_reviews.text: A very functional, nice looking wallet. I purchased as a gift for my husband, and we were not disappointed. If anything, I can say that we ordered in the California desert color so it's a light brown, and seems to be showing up the oil spots of your fingertips from touching it and a little of the dirt. So, that particular color might be hard to keep clean. However, as to the wallet itself it's a beautiful leather wallet that's very reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: This is the wallet to own
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this wallet. I've always put my wallets in my front, side pant/short pocket. As I've gotten older, I wear flat front business pants and slimmer fitting jeans. This wallet is so much thinner than my other bulky wallet and looks so much better in my pants. Also, the quality is exceptional, especially for the price. I would have paid double for this wallet. Love the easy access card tab. Money clip is....well...money! One of the best products I've purchased from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver D. Corbin

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived before the actual proposed delivery day. The wallet feels sturdy and looks great. I moved from a traditional to this minimalist wallet and there’s a big difference as I can now have a front pocket wallet and won’t have to be uncomfortable sitting on my wallet that’s in my back pocket. I thoroughly recommend for anyone looking for a change.
customer_reviews.author: Fabes

customer_reviews.title: Function and Quality priced Right!
customer_reviews.text: Great wallet. Perfect for my front pocket. I don't carry lots of plastic but this little guy has room for plenty. Has a primary card slot and window for license. The pull tab access to card "bin" is functional and just tight enough to keep everything secure. I have seen wallets with a lot less quality sell for quite a bit more. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: It's not as slim as you might think
customer_reviews.text: The first problem is that I didn’t receive what I ordered. The color is true, but the material is not the same. In the photos the material looks like suede leather, and I received smooth leather. The second problem is when I bought this wallet, I hoped that it would be thinner than my usual wallet. But because of the piece of leather that envelops the metal clasp for money, the wallet is even thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Aram

customer_reviews.title: Quality is Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever leave because reviews, but this wallet deserves one...I purchased this wallet because I need a new one, expecting it to be like all the others. Extremely well made and high quality...what I like the most is the little tab pocket. Pull on it and your credit cards come straight out and that makes it exceptionally easy to retrieve the card you wish to use. Highly recommended and will certainly tell anyone who might be interested where I got it from.
customer_reviews.author: thomas stange

customer_reviews.title: Excellent features,love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd wallet in as many weeks. What I like about this wallet is the ability to carry your paper money in a way that you just open your wallet and pull out desired bill. I really like to pull out compartment to store several cards. Just a fine,good quality product I love it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Howie

customer_reviews.title: Best Wallet Ever!
customer_reviews.text: You need this wallet!!! I bought it for my boyfriend and he is obsessed with it and will never use another wallet again. The slide aspect for the credit cards makes it so handy so you don't have to dig through your cards. Super nice quality as well. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Small but not too small to easily carry cash
customer_reviews.text: Had back problems and found out years of sitting on a bulky wallet wasn't helping. After countless reviews settled on this wallet. No longer carry in back pocket. This wallet is small but not too small. Serman brand seems to have a lot of thought and care put into their products. Get rid of that bulky wallet and do your back a favor and get one of these
customer_reviews.author: Beaver McCrackin

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, love the size
customer_reviews.text: It's so nice not having to take my wallet out of my back pocket every time I sit down now. The size is great and have learned I dont need to carry as much as I use to in my old wallets. Will never go back to the bulky wallets again.
customer_reviews.author: Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Well made, nice layout.
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a front pocket RFID wallet that works for me. Well made and well thought out. I’d buy again and may buy another just for that day when this wears out.
customer_reviews.author: Gee-oh

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical of using this wallet at first. I tend to over-pack everything in my life (Always be prepared). This wallet has converted me to a minimalist. It's slim and easy to use. I went from 15 cards to 6 with no trouble. This wallet has definitely made my life easier.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but......
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking and well made. But if you carry more than 4 credit cards and a driver's license it is not not you. You won't be able to easily pull your cards out.
customer_reviews.author: Tennis bum

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: It looks like a nice wallet. Well I received it with few scratches. So I read the instruction of how to remove scratches using olive oil. well I did, then my wallet turn into brown color instead of the california desert. I use a fowarder so it's not worth returning it. Update: After contacting customers service, they have decided to send me a new one absolutely free. I was stunned by the service they offered me. I love this wallet! Keep up the good work! Great service Serman Brands. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Loved this wallet so much I bought 4 in total ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved this wallet so much I bought 4 in total for friends and family. Amazing work done here. After having it for around 6 months I would say the only thing I would recommend to improve the product is to make the pull tab cord ( the nylon strap) more durable. I treat my wallet very well but I can definitely see someone accidentally ripping it out or at least taking the top off. For the price, I dont think you could get something that is as well made, leather, and minimalist. A great buy
customer_reviews.author: Scott Manley

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy the quality of leather. If you dont have alot of cards the wallet is great. If you have lots of cards I suggest going with one of their other models. The craftsmanship is amazing just a bit smaller than I thought it would be. 100 percent recommend this company and their wallets are very well made. I love the color of the tan and I also like how the moeny clip doesn't feel cheap. Great product guys
customer_reviews.author: John Pfaff

customer_reviews.title: Good Trim Line Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I like the trim line of the wallet and RFID blocking. I like the pull tab for pulling out cards inserted into wallet. However, mine was a bit too long so the tab flaps which eventually will cause an issue if it breaks off. One may say that it may need to be that length to accommodate more cards but that would then defeat the trim line of the wallet. Otherwise good construct, feel and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Cantrall

customer_reviews.title: A great wallet
customer_reviews.text: This wallet has been the best wallet I have used in the many years of using wallets. I love carrying with me the ID's and bank and credit cards some personal items in the wallet of choice at the same time I try to minimize how many items I carry. This wallets it's great I able to carry all the items I need and more. The most important aspect is that the wall give access to these items very quickly. Finally a great wallet!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this wallet a few months ago when my other one was stolen. I never use cash, only card; the wallet suits my needs perfectly. Only slightly concerned for future usage if I end up regularly using more than three credit cards as once, as selecting cards out of the pull up pouch in the wallet is relatively more cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Yang

product_meta.title: SERMAN BRANDS RFID Blocking Slim Bifold Genuine Leather Minimalist Front Pocket Wallets for Men with Money Clip
feature_bullets: PATENTED. 12 MONTH WARRANTY - The SERMAN BRANDS Warranty covers any factory defects as a result from the manufacturing process of the product.

SAFETY. PRIVACY. SECURITY - Our wallets are equipped with advanced RFID SECURE Technology, a unique metal composite, engineered specifically to block 13.56 MHz or higher RFID signals and protect the valuable information stored on RFID chips from unauthorized scans

SLIM AND STYLISH - Made with the Finest Full Grain / Top Grain genuine leather, Designed Quick Access ID Windows, Best Fits 6-8 cards plus US bills with no bulk, and a minimal Pull-tab design to reduce bulk - Wallet Size: 3.9" in. x 2.85" in. 0.5" in.

HOW IT WORKS- At last! A wallet that will meet your everyday needs. The SERMAN BRANDS card holder is equipped with a front pocket made for your most used card. 2 pockets on the inside, with a photo ID slot, and a money clip to hold your cash. Wallet case also has smart pull-strap for quick access to your everyday cards.

LEATHERS- We use only the finest leathers to make smart and stylish wallets! Premium full grain leathers that are soft and appealing! Our vintage leathers stay true to their nature by being receptive to scratches. With use the wallet will absorb the natural oils of your hands which will allow the wallet to develop a rich and dark color. Over time, your wallet will develop a character that matches your adventures.
